class mediator.common.test.test_modifiers.MockupModifierFactory[source]#

Bases: ModifierFactory

__init__(seq_item)[source]#

seq_item (str) –

create(call, **kwargs)[source]#

Produces action callable that wraps given one with extra behaviour.

Example: >>> class SomeModifierFactory: >>> def create(self, call: ActionCallType, **kwargs) -> ActionCallType: >>> async def wrapper(action: ActionSubject) -> ActionResult: >>> # … extra logic for arguments inspection or modification >>> result = await call(action) >>> # … extra logic for result inspection or modification >>> return result >>> >>> return wrapper

Parameters

  • call (Callable[[ActionSubject], Awaitable[ActionResult]]) – callable to be wrapped

  • kwargs – extra context information; currently contains:

Return type

Callable[[ActionSubject], Awaitable[ActionResult]]

target - final callable in stack (if stack of modifiers is built) :return: wrapped action callable that calls given one and acts with arguments or result
